effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Icebound Fortitude for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.

Set: Luck of the Draw! has 2 sec increased duration.

While Luck of the Draw! is active, Death Strike costs 10 less Runic Power and can strike up to 2 additional nearby enemies.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Helm of Lupine Ferocity

spells.description: Equip: Receiving direct healing from allies has a high chance to restore 3,125 mana to your ally and grant you both 403 Versatility for 10 sec.

effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to cast Icebound Fortitude for 4 sec and gain Luck of the Draw! which increases your damage dealt by 15% for 12 sec.

Set: Luck of the Draw! has 2 sec increased duration.

While Luck of the Draw! is active, Death Strike costs 10 less Runic Power and can strike up to 2 additional nearby enemies.

(2) Set: While you have one or more Bone Shield charges, the damage you take is reduced by 2.0%. Losing a Bone Shield charge has a chance to reduce the damage you take by an additional 1.0%, up to 3.0% for 6 sec.
(4) Set: Your damage is increased by 0.5% per active Bone Shield charge. Taking damage while below 6 Bone Shield charges has a chance to generate 1-2 Bone Shield charges.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 117,913 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Advance to the 50 Verses of Inner Resilience, reading as you are attacked.
Inner Resilience increases your armor by 3,495 and grants your attacks a chance to invoke a ward which absorbs 957,054 Magic damage. When finished, sift through the passages to another chapter.
Use: Sift through the passages in the tome with increased Radiance. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a very high chance to lash out with a Hateful Strike, inflicting 195,584 Physical damage to an enemy and healing you for 11,460. These effects are increased by 100% while you are below 35% health.
Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 117,913 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

enchantments.display_string: Enchanted: Rune of the Fallen Crusader

spells.description: Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
